title: Amazing Loops HD Pro v1.01
description:
Amazing Loops is a new, fun and addictive game that will push your mind to its limit. 

Think fast and use your logic to build amazing loops. This thrilling adventure will take you on a breathtaking journey through this dying galaxy in which you are the only hope to bring it back to its former beauty. 

Flex your brain as you struggle through waves of mind bending puzzles creating loops and using your intuition to fit the puzzle pieces together!

Features:

- Excellent graphics and gaming experience
Filled with stunning graphics and unique planets, Amazing Loops is a puzzle not to miss and an adventure that will keep you on the edge of your seat! The beautiful graphics of Amazing Loops will simply pop from your deviceÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s screen.

- One touch control
Play the game with just one finger. Simple to play, challenging to beat. This one touch feature allows for extremely intuitive and user friendly gaming.

- 60 epic levels
5 worlds and 60 levels to challenge will entertain and amuse gamers for days. Stay sharp and focus on your mission to save the worlds and earn up to 20 rewarding achievements!

- Leaderboards
Stay on top of your game with the global leaderboard. Challenge your friends and family to an exciting opportunity to save the galaxy one world at a time. Beat them and unleash your inner hero!

- For the whole family
This is a game that the whole family can enjoy. With its eye catching mix of colorful graphics and a blend of 60 addictive levels to work your way through, you will never be bored with Amazing Loops at your fingertips!

- A bunch of fun!
This original and addictive puzzle will keep you occupied for hours and with more downloadable levels on the horizon you will always find a new planet to resurrect!

Save the galaxy with the power of your mind. Can you rise to the challenge? Welcome to Amazing Loops.

What's New:

- 500 free coins
- Removed all ads
- HD Graphics
